thread.title: Marcus Mariota, Tennessee Titans vs. Buffalo Bills: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Marcus Mariota, Tennessee Titans vs. Buffalo Bills: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Marcus Mariota, Tennessee Titans vs. Buffalo Bills: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
UPDATE : We have a complete live chat and updated analysis of this Titans-Bills game and details on how Marcus Mariota is playing.
Mariota, the early frontrunner for the league's rookie of the year award, has performed beyond expectations. Mariota has handled the challenges of varying defensive schemes from opponents, and he will be tested by Buffalo coach Rex Ryan and his defense when the Titans face Buffalo (KOIN-6 (CBS), 10 a.m. PT/1 p.m. ET) .
Mariota hasn't used his legs very much, preferring to remain in the pocket and look for receivers in passing situations. He may be scrambling a little more often if the Titans offensive line cannot figure out the Bills defensive formations and blitz packages.
"I don't think the kid is going to have his way with us,'' Ryan told reporters during a teleconference call. "I don't think that is going to happen."
The Bills possess their own dual-threat quarterback in Tyrod Taylor. Taylor, who has been in the NFL for five years, doesn't possess much more game experience than Mariota. Taylor didn't play much during his first four seasons before Ryan named him the starting quarterback to begin the 2015 season.
If you want to watch Mariota and the Titans take on the Bills, here's what you need to know:
What : Buffalo Bills at Tennessee Titans
Where : Nissan Stadium, Nashville, TN
When : Sunday, Oct. 11, 10 a.m. PT/1 p.m. ET
TV : KOIN-6 (CBS)
Watch online : You can watch the live stream of DirecTV's live stream package.
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
